name: bqbp-webapp
tagline: my custom boilerplate (h5bp + grunt + bower + wiredep + normalize.css)
body:
# how to make it work:

* install yeoman (yo + grunt + bower) globaly
* $ npm install -g yo
* Install DevDependencies declared in Gruntfile.js
* $ npm install
* Install bower dependencies
* $ bower install
* run grunt-wiredep to link bower dependencies with index.html
* $ grunt bowerInstall
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
